Sat, 08 Feb 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Home buyer Matthew Poyntz was told by the Bayleys auctioneer his $1.305m bid for 12 Outlook Rd in Greenhithe in Auckland was successful. Then the house was sold to someone else.
